name: tasknotes
title: TaskNotes
description: Manage your TaskNotes tasks from Raycast â€” list, create, and quick-add tasks in your Obsidian vault.
author: jkrumm

commands.name: list-tasks
commands.title: My Tasks
commands.description: View and manage your TaskNotes tasks grouped by context

commands.name: add-task
commands.title: Add Task
commands.description: Create a new task with structured fields

commands.name: quick-add
commands.title: Quick Add
commands.description: Add a task using natural language

commands.name: help
commands.title: TaskNotes Help
commands.description: Keyboard shortcuts, contexts, and usage reference

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
